Title: Bully for You
Plot: When the class clown at the local high school is found murdered, the CSI team is called to investigate. Nick and Sara respond to the crime scene of a decomposed body found in a bag.
GuestStars: Tess Harper, Christopher Wiehl, Dublin James, Lisa Brenner, Joseph Kell, James Baltes, Brady Bluhm, Thomas Crawford, Josh Gilman, Michael Krawic, Randy Lowell, Jamie Martz
